name: FlyShadows
description: Shadow class with type-safe access to shadow values

values.2xs: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.05), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 0.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)
values.xs: BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.05), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 2.0, spreadRadius: 0.0)

values.md: [BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 4.0), blurRadius: 6.0, spreadRadius: -1.0), BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 2.0), blurRadius: 4.0, spreadRadius: -2.0)]
values.lg: [BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 10.0), blurRadius: 15.0, spreadRadius: -3.0), BoxShadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 4.0), blurRadius: 6.0, spreadRadius: -4.0)]
